text: Hello, I'm building a theme for a client and I have a module for a full width hero. When I add them in the templates I can set the dnd_section to be full width. But if the client drags it to the content the section of course is not full width. Is there any way to pre set the section or something for a specific module so that when they drag it it looks full width too?

Anyone seen these errors when working in templates with simple menus? Getting it on the simple menu tag copied from here: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/building-blocks/menus-and-navigation#:~:text=The%20HubL%20Simple%20Menu%20Tag,-Similar%20to%20the&text=This%20is%20good%20for%20when,that%20field%20into%20this%20tag>.
